name: Host full stack app udacity
description: Hosting full stack application on aws for udacity javascript nano degree

scripts.backend:build: cd udagram-api && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.backend:test: cd udagram-api && npm run test && cd ..
scripts.backend:cp: cd udagram-api && aws s3 cp ./www/Archive.zip s3://seifsudagram/ && cd ..
scripts.backend:create: cd udagram-api && aws elasticbeanstalk create-application-version --application-name udagram-api --version-label <<pipeline.git.revision>> --source-bundle S3Bucket='seifsudagram',S3Key='Archive.zip' && cd ..
scripts.front:build: cd udagram-frontend && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.front:test: cd udagram-frontend && npm run test && cd ..
scripts.front:e2e: cd udagram-frontend && npm run e2e && cd ..
scripts.front:deploy: cd udagram-frontend && aws s3 cp --recursive --acl public-read ./www s3://seifsudagram/ && cd ..
